name: Virtual Shock
description:
Virtual Shock is a horror themed immersive VR sci-fi exploration game where you wake up in a cryopod in a derelict space station and you soon realise that you are the only survivor and the whole station is infested with hostile aliens.

The game was made for Valve Index but it is also fully playable with HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.

Our team is comprised of six students studying Bachelor's Degree in Business Information Technology and two students studying Vocational Qualification in Business Information Technology  and the game was done during the Ticorporate VII Demo Lab project course in JAMK University of Applied Sciences. The project was completed in four months and the development took our team about 3400 man-hours and countless cups of coffee :D

Disclaimer: As a part of this  school project we built a web service that collects data from each playthrough of our game. At the first startup the game will generate you a random ID-number that is visible in the main menu of the game and the following data will be collected and sent to our database from each playsession:

  • Your game ID
  • Playtime and date
  • Bullets shot
  • Bullets that hit an enemy
  • Melee hits
  • Times the player character has died
  • Amount of damage dealt on monsters
  • Amount of monsters defeated
  • Secrets found
  • Distance travelled

We will take down the web service and release a patched version of the game that does not have these data collecting features in 31.5.2020.

More videos of the project can be found in our projects youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHaWL1ru1tHllXvgjeQFBZQ

You can listen to the music featured in our game here: https://soundcloud.com/user-231552178/sets/virtual-shock-music

More information about the Ticorporate can be found here: https://ticorporate.fi/
